preqs: Students must have passed one of the following units: ACW2020 or AFW2020 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACB3021, ACC3131, ACF3431, ACG3021, ACW3021, AFC3131, AFF3431, AFG3021}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 13, 40, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACB2020, ACC2131, ACF2391, ACG2020, ACW2020, AFC2131, AFF2391, AFG2020, AFW2020} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {3244, ACW3021, AFB2021, AFG2021, AFW2021%, AFW2021H, AFW2021S, AFW3021%, AFX2431, GBU2004, GBU2004H, GBU2004I, GBU2004S}

description: Topics include the budget planning process including master budget preparation, budgeting standard costs and variance analysis, responsibility accounting, management by objectives and non-financial performance measurement, divisional performance, transfer pricing issues, program budgeting and other approaches, capital budgeting, strategic planning and control.
